product_name: Mountain N' Air Books The Runner's World Big Book of Marathon and Half-Marathon Training
long_description: Packed full of winning strategies and useful training tools, The Runner's World Big Book of Marathon and Half-Marathon Training prepares you for the big day with step-by-step advice.
